# Create Together Remastered

This is the remastered repository and issue-tracker for the modpack Create Together, for Minecraft. Has no affiliation with the original creators of the pack, but has permission to be published online.

### Table of Contents

-   [Start A Server (SOON)](#start-a-server)
-   [Links](#links)

<hr></hr>

# Start A Server (SOON)

Launch the `automation/launch_server.sh` to generate all the files and launch the server.

You can modify the config from within the file.

## Links

-   [CurseForge](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/modpacks/createtogether-remastered)
-   [GitHub](https://github.com/reuban-bryenton/CreateTogetherRemastered/issues)
-   [Original CurseForge](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/modpacks/createtogether)
